name: Ashby
headline: All-in-one recruiting software for high growth companies
description:
At Ashby, we're improving the productivity of working professionals with intelligent and powerful software. We put a lot of effort into designing products that are approachable to beginners but mastered & extended by power users. In many ways, spreadsheets set the bar here.

Our first products provide talent teams with clever automation, powerful analytics tools, and customizable workflows packaged in great UX. We have many paying customers who love us and use us every day like Opendoor, Airtable, Duolingo, and Notion. Notion's Head of Talent said Ashby is "probably the tool we are in the most and rely on the most, as a recruiting team."

Our culture is motivated by Abhik's (my co-founder and Head of Engineering) and my belief that a small talented team, given the right environment, can build a great product and service fast (and work regular hours!). We hire exceptional, kind, thoughtful people and provide an environment where we can be happy, feel challenged, and do our best work.

We are well funded and backed by great investors, including Y Combinator, Elad Gil, and Lachy Groom. We'll share more once we meet!

founders.name: Benjamin Encz, Founder
founders.description: Co-Founder & CEO of Ashby. Prior Director of Engineering at PlanGrid.

founders.name: Abhik Pramanik, Founder
founders.description: Co-Founder & Head of Engineering at Ashby. Prior Senior Product Manager at PlanGrid, Lob. In a previous life, built physics engines at Industrial Light & Magic and Dreamworks Animation.

## Ashby Platform
## ATS
## Scheduling
## CRM
## Analytics
## All-In-One Recruiting Platform
An integrated solution designed to help companies of all sizes excel at hiring. Ambitious hiring teams love Ashby.
![Ashby Platform Illustration](https://www.ashbyhq.com)
![](data:image/svg+xml,%3csvg%20xmlns=%27http://www.w3.org/2000/svg%27%20version=%271.1%27%20width=%271400%27%20height=%27868%27/%3e)![Woman working with a laptop](https://www.ashbyhq.com/_next/image?url=%2Fimages%2Fhomepage%2Fwoman-working-with-laptop.jpg&w=3840&q=75)
![Analytics charts](https://www.ashbyhq.com/_next/image?url=%2Fimages%2Fproduct%2Fanalytics-micro.png&w=3840&q=75)
![Candidate Pipeline view](https://www.ashbyhq.com/_next/image?url=%2Fimages%2Fproduct%2Fcandidate-pipeline-micro.png&w=3840&q=75)
## Product Tour
## Products designed to help you excel at hiring — no matter your company stage
[![Ashby All-In-One for Startups](https://www.ashbyhq.com/images/product/startups-icon.svg)Ashby All-in-oneFor Startups1–100 employeesGet a head start on recruiting with an all-in-one product that is easy to use and will scale with you.Learn more](https://www.ashbyhq.com/</startups>)[![Ashby All-In-One for Growth](https://www.ashbyhq.com/images/product/growth-icon.svg)Ashby All-in-oneFor Growth101-1000 employeesA powerful all-in-one recruiting product that will help your scaling organization excel at hiring.Learn more](https://www.ashbyhq.com/</growth>)[![Ashby All-In-One for Enterprise](https://www.ashbyhq.com/images/product/enterprise-icon.svg)Ashby All-in-oneFor Enterprise1000+ employeesA proven all-in-one recruiting solution that supports large organizations with sophisticated hiring needs.Learn more](https://www.ashbyhq.com/</enterprise>)[![Ashby Analytics for your existing ATS](https://www.ashbyhq.com/images/product/analytics-hero-icon.svg)Ashby AnalyticsFor your existing ATSAdvanced recruiting analytics that work on top of your existing recruiting tools.Learn more](https://www.ashbyhq.com/</analytics>)
![Replit](https://www.ashbyhq.com/customers/profiles/replit.png)
![Deel](https://www.ashbyhq.com/customers/profiles/deel-wordmark.png)
![Cointracker](https://www.ashbyhq.com/customers/profiles/cointracker.svg)
![Coder](https://www.ashbyhq.com/customers/profiles/coder.svg)
![Help Scout](https://www.ashbyhq.com/customers/profiles/helpscout.svg)
> Ashby is easily the best ATS I’ve used in my 10+ years of recruiting. Loving the power of the system and the customization. I feel like it’s sparked a renewed passion for me when it comes to the abilities of an ATS. Happy we made the switch.
> ![Chase Johnson](https://www.ashbyhq.com)
> Chase Johnson
> Talent at Replit
> The biggest reason I recommend Ashby is because of how much you can automate activities within different stages. When you first set up a new vacancy on Ashby, you can set up all the different things that you want to be automated between each step of the process. It saves you countless hours of admin time throughout the process.
> ![Huw Sensier](https://www.ashbyhq.com)
> Huw Sensier
> Talent Acquisition Manager at Deel
> We just switched from _Legacy ATS_. Long story short - Ashby is amazing. They are taking an end-to-end approach to recruiting that is startup-friendly. They combine the functionality of sourcing, outreach, applicant tracking, analytics (much better than _Legacy ATS_), scheduling automation and more. Best of all they have a strong & responsive support team, they make on-boarding super easy. I wish Ashby had been around when we launched so we could have just started with them from the beginning.
> ![Chandan Lohdan](https://www.ashbyhq.com)
> Chandan Lohdan
> Hiring at Cointracker
> I am really impressed so far! It was tricky to get other hiring managers using other ATS's and they seem to be enjoying Ashby for collaboration.
> ![Camilla Lever](https://www.ashbyhq.com)
> Camilla Lever
> Director of People at Coder
> I know this sounds weird, but I’m super excited to start using Ashby very soon. Finally a proper ATS!
> ![Dali Chabaane](https://www.ashbyhq.com)
> Dali Chabaane
> Senior Technical Recruiter at Help Scout
## Hear from our customers
## Why Ashby?
## How Ashby enables hiring excellence
Hiring has changed and so should your tools. Companies that excel at hiring have a strategic advantage. Our approach to building Ashby centers around ambitious teams that question the status quo:
### We've designed Ashby to:
Be **easy** to get started with, **powerful** when you're ready
Enable **structured hiring** end-to-end
**Automate** with a human touch
Provide instant **visibility** and **reduce clicks**
Enable **custom reporting** to unlock real insights
Offer **one integrated system** for your entire hiring process
### To help you achieve:
Improved candidate experience
More accurate and fair candidate assessments
Hiring team productivity
Continuous improvement through data feedback loops
Visibility for the entire hiring team
Stronger, more diverse candidate pipelines
[Read Our Story](https://www.ashbyhq.com/</story>)
## Hiring excellence is one conversation away.
Connect with our team and learn how Ashby can help your team grow faster and better.
[Get in Touch](https://www.ashbyhq.com/</request-demo>)

generated_description:
**Company Overview: Ashby**

Founded in 2018 and based in San Francisco, Ashby is a dynamic player in the recruiting software space, particularly for high-growth companies. Its mission is straightforward but powerful: to provide an all-in-one recruiting platform that enhances productivity for talent acquisition teams.

**The Product**

At its core, Ashby combines clever automation, robust analytics, and versatile workflows, all wrapped in user-friendly design. It caters to everyone—from startups to large enterprises—ensuring that both beginners and power users can navigate the tools seamlessly. Notable clients like Opendoor, Airtable, Duolingo, and Notion swear by its effectiveness, with Notion's Head of Talent stating it’s their most relied-upon tool for recruitment.

Ashby's suite includes features such as Applicant Tracking System (ATS), scheduling tools, CRM capabilities, and advanced analytics. This integration positions Ashby as an ideal solution for companies looking to streamline their hiring processes.

**Company Culture**

Ashby’s culture is defined by a belief that small, talented teams can build exceptional products when given the right environment. Co-founders aim to create a workplace filled with exceptional, kind, and thoughtful individuals, fostering happiness and challenge in their roles. It’s clear that Ashby values both the wellbeing of its employees and the quality of its output.

**Funding and Growth**

Backed by prestigious investors including Y Combinator, Elad Gil, and Lachy Groom, Ashby is well-funded and on a trajectory of growth. With a team of 110 employees, they have significant support to continue innovating in the recruitment space.

**Conclusion**

In essence, Ashby is not just another ATS; it’s a comprehensive tool tailored to meet the needs of modern hiring teams. It aims to disrupt the status quo, making hiring faster, fairer, and more efficient. If you’re part of a team looking to improve your recruitment process and leverage cutting-edge technology, Ashby could be exactly what you need.
